title: Sean Payton's Future in New Orleans and More NFL Coaching Chaos | 'GM Street' (Ep. 222)
description:
The Ringer's Michael Lombardi and Tate Frazier discuss Todd Haley's tenure ending in Pittsburgh (00:30), the future of the Saints and Sean Payton (07:15), the drawn-out hiring process in Arizona (18:45), Pat Shurmur possibly taking over the Giants (22:30), the Josh McDaniels窶的ndianapolis rumors (28:00), and how Tennessee's playoff win hurt the team (29:30).
